concept.title: Examples
concept.shortdesc: Example topics can be used to illustrate tasks, concepts, or reference information, when an example section doesn't provide enough room.

conbody.p: Author examples as generic topics. Examples cannot be reliably typed as any of the core types, since examples can be used to support any other type, and thus could be answering any number of different questions depending on where they are accessed from ("How do I code a mailquery?" for a task, "What does the mailquery interface look like?" for reference, or "Coding standards" for a concept).
Within the generic topic, you can still use appropriate markup, such as <codeblock> for code fragments or file listings.
